original_text: Now after that John was put in prison, Jesus came into Galilee, preaching the gospel of the kingdom of God,
korean_text: 요한이 잡힌 후 예수께서 갈릴리에 오셔서 하나님의 복음을 전파하여

sentences.original_text: Now after that John was put in prison
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 요한이 감옥에 갇혔을 때

sentences.original_text: preaching the gospel of the kingdom of God
